definition: an activity that varies from a norm or standard
details:
noun
- an activity that varies from a norm or standard
= example: an activity that varies from a norm or standard
= synonyms: variance
- the act of changing or altering something slightly but noticeably from the norm or standard
= example: the act of changing or altering something slightly but noticeably from the norm or standard
- (ballet) a solo dance or dance figure
= synonyms: pas seul
- an artifact that deviates from a norm or standard
= example: an artifact that deviates from a norm or standard
- something a little different from others of the same type
= synonyms: variant, edition
- a repetition of a musical theme in which it is modified or embellished
- an instance of change
= synonyms: fluctuation
- (biology) an organism that has characteristics resulting from chromosomal alteration
= synonyms: mutant
- (astronomy) any perturbation of the mean motion or orbit of a planet or satellite (especially a perturbation of the earth's moon)
- the process of varying or being varied
- the angle (at a particular location) between magnetic north and true north
= synonyms: magnetic declination, magnetic variation
